ComicInfo.Summary: Deep, Dark Truthful Mirror: Dash learns that Kodiak can transform into his human form--that of a teenage kid. The boys take Reign to a bar to celebrate his twenty-first birthday but end up getting attacked by the Brotherhood of Man. Back home, Dash reveals to Kodiak that she is pregnant and her pregnancy is progressing at an abnormally rapid rate.
